title: File is unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the Java file remains unchanged but is marked as dirty.
OB: When using code assist with no suggestions, the Java file should remain unchanged and not be marked as dirty.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1122. To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open a Java file. 
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call. For example, consider the cursor below: 
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I); 
3. Press Ctrl+Space to trigger code assist.
